title: Call for Abstracts
description: We are pleased to invite submissions of abstracts for our upcoming conference. This event provides a valuable platform for researchers, academics, and professionals to share their insights, findings, and innovations across various fields.
topics: Analytical and Numerical Methods for ODEs and PDEs
Controllability, Observability, and Stability of Differential Equations
guidelines: Abstracts should be no longer than 300 words.
Please include the title of the paper, the names of the authors, and their affiliations.
Submissions should be made by 30 September 2025.
closingNote: Selected abstracts will be presented at the conference, offering an excellent opportunity for discussion and networking. We look forward to your contributions and insights that will enrich our conference.
